trans-unit.resname: LEB·10 | Circle of Protection: Black | Card Name
LEB·10 | Circle of Protection: Black | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}: The next time a black source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
trans-unit.target: {1}：选择一个黑色的来源。于本回合中，防止该来源下一次将对你造成的伤害。

trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；
